ERROR_ANSWER: I'm sorry, we had a problem with the request. Please report the error to the support team.
ERROR_SEARCHING_DOCUMENTS: I'm sorry, I had a technical problem searching the documents. Please report the error to the support team.
ERROR_CALLING_GPT: I'm sorry, I had a technical problem when calling the GPT model. Please report the error to the support team.
THROTTLING_ANSWER: I'm sorry, our servers are too busy, please try again in a minute.
